<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Add unvisited successors to the work list.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Traits::BlkSucc&#95;iterator <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a> =</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal">             <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = Traits::BlkSucc&#95;end(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a>-&gt;BB); <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a> != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>; ++<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// IntersectDominators - This is the dataflow lattice &quot;meet&quot; operation for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// finding dominators.  Given two basic blocks, it walks up the dominator</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// tree until it finds a common dominator of both.  It uses the postorder</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// number of the blocks to determine how to do that.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ssaupdaterimpl/#ad25fe079e293e33582cbb5f3bf494bf5"><Highlight kind="normal">  BBInfo &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ssaupdaterimpl/#ad25fe079e293e33582cbb5f3bf494bf5">IntersectDominators</a>(BBInfo &#42;Blk1, BBInfo &#42;Blk2) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Blk1 != Blk2) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Blk1-&gt;BlkNum &lt; Blk2-&gt;BlkNum) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="normal">        Blk1 = Blk1-&gt;IDom;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Blk1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Blk2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Blk2-&gt;BlkNum &lt; Blk1-&gt;BlkNum) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="normal">        Blk2 = Blk2-&gt;IDom;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Blk2)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Blk1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Blk1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// FindDominators - Calculate the dominator tree for the subset of the CFG</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// corresponding to the basic blocks on the BlockList.  This uses the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// algorithm from: &quot;A Simple, Fast Dominance Algorithm&quot; by Cooper, Harvey</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// and Kennedy, published in Software--Practice and Experience, 2001,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// 4:1-10.  Because the CFG subset does not include any edges leading into</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// blocks that define the value, the results are not the usual dominator</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// tree.  The CFG subset has a single pseudo-entry node with edges to a set</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// of root nodes for blocks that define the value.  The dominators for this</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// subset CFG are not the standard dominators but they are adequate for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// placing PHIs within the subset CFG.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ssaupdaterimpl/#a0ab1c1435c29eea38d7a8dd64f064b84"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ssaupdaterimpl/#a0ab1c1435c29eea38d7a8dd64f064b84">FindDominators</a>(BlockListTy &#42;BlockList, BBInfo &#42;PseudoEntry) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Iterate over the list in reverse order, i.e., forward on CFG edges.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#af6a3df9bf4da2b9af52a9ad973e6f30c">BlockListTy::reverse&#95;iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = BlockList-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a23aab542398091e1fcfd46b6006d64ac">rbegin</a>(),</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="normal">        BBInfo &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a> = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="normal">        BBInfo &#42;NewIDom = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Iterate through the block&#39;s predecessors.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> p = 0; p != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a>-&gt;NumPreds; ++p) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="normal">          BBInfo &#42;Pred = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a>-&gt;Preds&#91;p&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Treat an unreachable predecessor as a definition with &#39;poison&#39;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Pred-&gt;BlkNum == 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><Highlight kind="normal">            Pred-&gt;AvailableVal = Traits::GetPoisonVal(Pred-&gt;BB, Updater);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="normal">            (&#42;AvailableVals)&#91;Pred-&gt;BB&#93; = Pred-&gt;AvailableVal;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="normal">            Pred-&gt;DefBB = Pred;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="normal">            Pred-&gt;BlkNum = PseudoEntry-&gt;BlkNum;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="normal">            PseudoEntry-&gt;BlkNum++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="normal">          &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!NewIDom)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="normal">            NewIDom = Pred;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// IsDefInDomFrontier - Search up the dominator tree from Pred to IDom for</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ssaupdaterimpl/#a361f4564a774bbb16b4a27667256c5ad"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ssaupdaterimpl/#a361f4564a774bbb16b4a27667256c5ad">CheckIfPHIMatches</a>(PhiT &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpurewriteundefforphi-cpp/#a2e83cb1bc3f5e8986cbd14575755a134">PHI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;BBInfo &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;TaggedBlocks) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Skip to the nearest preceding definition.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check if it matches the expected value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check if the value is a PHI in the correct block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><Highlight kind="normal">        PhiT &#42;IncomingPHIVal = Traits::ValueIsPHI(IncomingVal, Updater);</Highlight></CodeLine>
